newsitem.title: USA: Hilton to lead U.S. corporate debt issuance.
newsitem.headline: Hilton to lead U.S. corporate debt issuance.

text.p: U.S. corporate debt issuance is expected to be revived on Wednesday with at least one big trust preferred deal and a $200 million five-year issue from Hilton Hotels Corp, dealers said.
Lead underwriter Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette Securities will launch the hotel deal on Wednesday morning, according to syndicate sources.
The high-yield spotlight remains on telecom-related issues with price talk on the $125 million Paging Network do Brasil confirming players' expectations for the inclusion of significant equity.
